description.@en: By ringing a tiny bell or clapper, you protect an area against trespass.

data.distance: Any one object or portal you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: Tracing your fingers to produce the wards causes terrible intestinal discomfort. You suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] physical Peril.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the Warding never fades. It can be dispelled though.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the object or portal you touch can make you mentally aware if it has been trespassed against or stolen â€“ even if you are asleep or hundreds of leagues away. Once triggered, the Magick fades.

reagents.@en: A tiny bell rung three times
